entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Invalid optimization of (-1 * -A) + A #61077
  • Memory allocation in .NET fails at 70% of the container limit when running in Kubernetes #61076
  • Assertion failed '!parentStruct->lvUndoneStructPromotion' during 'Mark local vars' #61074
  • ReadyToRun + PublishSingleFile=true: Possibility to specify compression codec and compression level #61073
  • [wasm] Surface errors from `emcc --version`, like missing python #61067
  • [DllImportGenerator] Fix inconsistencies in signature of updated p/invokes #61062
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests - Maximum call stack size exceeded #61061
    7.0.0
  • system.io.pipelines sample that shows server responding to data that client is sending #61060
  • [Nethost/Hostfxr] Hosting: How to get runtime to probe application folder #61059
  • [Wasm][AOT] Precompilation fails using Syncfusion.Blazor.dll #61053
  • Supported Versions in SslStream #61051
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_16833/Test16833/Test16833.sh #61050
    7.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: Invalid optimization of (-1 * -A) + A #61078
  • Revisit BrotliStream CompressionLevel values #46595
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Discarded cast on RHS of assignment leads to missing sign extension #60597
    7.0.0
  • Constant pool should share values #35268
    Future
  • dotnet publish fails when RunAOTCompilation is set to true #60274
    7.0.0
  • Add ToList(capacity) and ToDictionary(capacity) to System.Linq.Enumerable #29620
    Future
  • dotnet support android sdk, runtime #61031
  • Suggestions: Add .UniqueOrDefault() to handle multiple occurrences without Exception #29398
    Future
  • Feature Request: .ToDictionary overload for IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<IKey,IValue>> returning Dictionary<IKey,IValue> #24900
    Future
  • LINQ performance of .Where(pred).Any() against .Any(pred) #53274
    Future
  • Dotnet doesn't run apps from /tmp on Linux #59280
  • DOTNET_ROLL_FORWARD=Major ignores in new builds of .net 6 since preview 7 #58754
    7.0.0
  • LINQ SelectAggregate #26945
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add TrySelect #59463
    Future
  • Linux: NativeLibrary.TryGetExport terminates the process when handle parameter does not a real handle to library. #60758
    7.0.0
  • Consume PosixSignal in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #56058
    7.0.0
  • Proposal: Non-generic IReadOnlyDictionary interface #28402
    Future
  • [Question] Why no Task<bool> for SemaphoreSlim WaitAsync (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) #61052
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluate testList[0] #60340
  • Exception when adding multiple PolicyHandlers to IHttpClientBuilder #61056

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix x86 stackwalk for UnmanagedCallersOnly #61075
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] simplify startup configuration #61072
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix inconsistency in p/invoke arguments introduced when switching some to be blittable #61071
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Avoid bogus cred scanning hits #61070
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • revert 58594 CacheCredential change #61069
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add Maui iOS and MacCatalyst build steps #61068
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix refcount when a composite r2r image is loaded from a bundle #61066
    area-Single-File
  • Adding support for X86Base.Pause() and ArmBase.Yield() #61065
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add TFM and version support query to marshaller interface. #61064
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix dump generation issues for VS4Mac #61063
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Check yml conditions in xplat-setup #61055
  • Make WeakReferenceCollection thread safe #61054
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution

Merged

  • Validate CompressionLevel value is defined in BrotliStream ctor #57561
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix 60597 by using genActualType #61057
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Delete duplicate test projects #61024
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • support loading versioned libmsquic #61021
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Updating named mutex design docs #60246
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consume PosixSignal in Hosting.Systemd's SystemdLifetime #59880
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix various dump generation issues for VS4Mac #60995
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix for #60340 #60863
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging blazor app after ts changes. #60873
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Disable implicit tailcalls for throwhelpers #61006
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Seed the unified System.Security.Cryptography.dll #61025
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Add linux x86 build CI for pull request #60817
    * NO MERGE *, community-contribution
  • Make QCalls respect the EntryPoint property #60992
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Use SIMD operations in genCodeForInitBlkUnroll and increase INITBLK_UNROLL_LIMIT to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT: Recognize sbfiz/ubfiz idioms #61045
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT: Fix IsContainableImmed for arm64 v8.1 or higher #61035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Some VN refactoring #61034
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [arm64] JIT: Fold "A * B + C" to MADD/MSUB #61037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #60988
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono] Add mono_class_get_special_jit_flags and MONO_SPECIAL_JIT_DEFER_CLASS_INIT_TO_CTOR #60987
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix: Incorrect order of checks for TypeBuilder `GetConstructor` and `GetField` method #53645
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: addressing modes #61026
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59522
    area-System.Reflection, needs more info, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` #61020
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Guarded Devirt: multiple type checks #59604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix BigInteger.Parse returns bogus value for exponents above 1000 #55397
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 - Second attempt #60054
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60561
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.1
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • add unit test for variable length encoding HTTP/3 #60766
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix time-of-use vs. time-of-check "bugs" #60860
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Disable "Implement abstract class" for VB when inheriting from C# abstract record #57510
  • Source generator server cache should consider MetadataReferences #57503
    17.1
  • Renaming class "Program" does not work and behaves weirdly in file with top-level statements #57495
  • Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.InvocationExpressionSyntax' to type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Syntax.TypeSyntax' #57494
  • Documentation recommends inefficient way to read file. #57492
  • Roslyn fails to verify [NotNullIfNotNull] annotations in lambda expression to delegate conversions #57491

Closed

  • VS Quick Info code sample formatting not preserved #57262
    17.1
  • False positive with nested functions: warning CS0162: Unreachable code detected #51010
    Compiler.Next
  • Method group is not classified as "method name" when assigned to Delegate #57184
    17.1
  • Suggested change would break code #57472

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache the stale syntax-indices we load prior to OOP being fully hydrated. #57514
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure only one storage service factory gets created per workspace. #57513
    Area-IDE
  • Merges/main to features/param nullchecking #57512
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Avoid recomputing expensive persistence location data that does not change. #57511
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.9-vs-deps #57508
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57506
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.7-vs-deps #57504
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized missing warning message #57296 #57502
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57499
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57498
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.1 #57496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Minor updates to "Using additional files" docs #57493
    Area-Analyzers, Community

Merged

  • Fix param-nullchecking build/test failures #57375
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57507
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update PublishData.json #57509
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Options Refactoring - Round 3 #57254
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Run net6.0-windows unit tests in CI #57480
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix 'simplify conditional expression' with VB value equality #57487
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not normalize leading whitespace in code comments #57414
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57497
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57500
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Reference VS Debugger.Contracts in DebuggerContractVersionCheck #57479
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57501
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix inline diagnostics location issue in VB #57473
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Move search under tabs #57188
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Classify method group assignments as methods #57410
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57515
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • MSBuildWorkspace Add Reload Apis #52554
    Area-IDE
  • Benchmark for Inheritance Margin #57445
    Area-IDE
  • Interpolated string handlers in the CFG #57483
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix for "Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation" #57191
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Visual Studio 2022 Editor Color Scheme #57138
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • When we're loading dependencies in VS, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.11-vs-deps #57482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Update SymReader packages to the latest #57458
    Area-Compilers
  • Upgrade xunit to get newer asserts #57398
    Area-Compilers
  • [DNM] Testing pool provider changes - Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56910
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Slice value is always assumed to be not null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assembly that ends in 'dotnet' fails ANCM in Azure #38004
  • Consider adding an API that enables invoking the default parameter binding logic of RequestDelegateFactory explicitly #38003
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Remove Libuv transport #38002
    7.0-preview1
  • Startup regression: mvc, plaintext #37997
  • Perf regression: caching #37996
  • Make ResponseCacheMiddleware endpoint aware #37995
    .NET 7 Planning
  • blazor-wasm publish missing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.dll #37994
  • Versioning Api endpoints with webapi .net 6 and swagger error #37993
  • Content Security Policy blocks script execution in default template. #37992
  • Consider writing an analyzer that produces warnings when using sync APIs on IDistributedCache #37991
    Backlog
  • ServerCanAbortConnectionAfterUnobservedClose-Loopback test failure #37990
  • add an analyzer to catch parameter name mismatches between route and [FromRoute] params #37987
  • TypeNameHandling not working with abstract classes: "Type specified in JSON 'T' was not resolved." #37986
  • EntityFrameworkCoreXmlRepository Seems Suboptimal? #37985
  • Missing of cookieless session management #37978
  • NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter: Deserialize error handling #37977
  • Startup regression: json #37976
  • Perf regression: updates #37975
  • BrowserRefreshServer.WaitForClientConnectionAsync #37974

Closed

  • Does GRPC run on Web App (App Services) as of November 2021? #37988
  • Send Alt-Svc frame in HTTP/2 rather than header. #18928
    Backlog
  • dotnet.js whereabouts #37999
    Discussions
  • Hot reload loses CSS from referenced projects #37592
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor wasm Datetime controller Parameter throwing error, The value '01.11.2021 16:17:40 01:00' is not valid. #37989
  • SignalR client timeout on StartAsync behaves differently across platforms and does not appear to be configurable #37824
  • Blazor HeadOutlet is not pre-rendering #37960
  • How to declare a method target attribute on `BuildRenderTree`? #37970
  • Blazor Server limit @bind content size #37973
  • Blazor File Downloads Documentation #30736
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Attempt to disable Blazor WASM AOT #37984
  • Perf improvement: caching, connectionclosehttps, mvc #36713
  • Blazor WASM - AD B2C - Unable to get access_token MSAL 2.0 #37928
  • How to set AppInsightKey based on Environment Variable in Blazor wasm Hosted App #37953
  • blazor was server prerendering error #37965

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK #38001
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `a575301` to `ffdec25` #37983
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37981
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37980
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37979
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/3.1] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37969
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 3.1.x
  • [release/5.0] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37968
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37967
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37966
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Hide test infrastructure from the solution explorer #38000
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Run Sockets.BindTests in sequence #37998
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update StartupAnalyzers to use Analyzer.Testing library #37934
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • feat (Codespaces) - Added Commonly used tasks to `tasks.json` for VSCode users. #37873
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Unquarantine `AuthorizeViewCases_RequirePolicy_Authorized` #37717
    area-blazor
  • Adding descriptions in HttpSysOptions #37949
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Make in-memory HTTP/2 tests more deterministic #37948
    area-runtime
  • Create ReleasePlanning.md #37940
    Docs, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] ContentPage.OnAppearing is not getting called #3216
  • [Bug] PanGestureRecognizer stops firing the PanUpdated event if the target control is removed and re-added to the container #3215
  • [Bug] BoxView loses background color when its parent is removed and re-added to the container #3214
  • [Bug] On iOS: The type initializer for 'SQLite.SQLiteConnection' threw an exception (Android works) #3211
  • [Bug] When showing DisplayActionSheet first time, custom control (ViewRenderer) that is placed in same page is recreated #3210
  • Unable to download dotnet-install script when behind a proxy server #3209
  • Unable to debug android emulator #3208

Closed

  • [Bug] Current Remap strategy inside controls doesn't work when Element is referenced inside App.Xaml Style #2935
  • [Bug] ToolbarItem handler is not getting called #3217
  • [Bug] Shell TitleColor in UWP #3076
  • [Bug] Shell FlyoutBackgroundColor property has no effect #3030
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Shell, WinUI] Shell.SetNavBarIsVisible #1630
  • [Enhancement] Add ability to embed the wwwroot web files when using Blazor Wpf and WinForms controls #1520

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Forms DeviceInfo and use Essentials #3213
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • [compatibility] IsTrimmable support, fix linker warnings #3161
  • Clean up Shell Chrome Behaviors #3165
    area/shell 🐢
  • BlazorWebView support for loading custom static assets #3191
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3195
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Implement .NET 6 features for templates. #3018
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Multi Window Support #2811
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [X] Incremental SourceGenerator #2772
    area/Xaml </>, do-not-merge
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Remove usage of IsolatedStorage #2710
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Set up for unpackaged app projects #3172
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add IHighlightLayer #3205

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A testing-only transaction manager which replaces nested transactions with savepoints #26504
  • ambiguous between the following methods: FromSqlRaw in RelationalQueryableExtensions and CosmosQueryableExtensions #26502
  • Bundle-Migration failing #26501
  • EF Core Custom Extension #26500
  • Irrelevant value in the shadow property leads to an wrong state of the nested entity in the StateManager #26499
  • Scaffolder throws error if junction table foreign key columns have identical names #26496

Closed

  • .Contains fails with using a IReadOnlySet #26437
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.21.0 to 3.22.1 #26503
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495

Merged

  • Query: Identify Contains on IReadOnlySet/IImmutableSet #26487
    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build_LinuxPortable_Release_x64 leg consistently failing PR validation in release/6.0.1xx #12575
  • [Loc] Truncation issue on uninstallation UI on local OS #12570

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ulimit #12576
  • Only add intermediates to previous source-built archive #12574

Updated

  • Update branding for 6.0.2xx #12548
  • Enable offline build and capture artifacts in PR validation #12562
  • [release/6.0.1xx] [ArPow] Add smoke test for OmniSharp #12251
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #12544
